turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Weroance.
turn.1: What is the Powhatan tribe's weroance?
turn.2: Weroance Weroance is an Algonquian word meaning leader or commander among the Powhatan confederacy of the Virginia coast and Chesapeake Bay region.
turn.4: Weroances were under a paramount chief called Powhatan.
turn.6: The Powhatan Confederacy, encountered by the colonists of Jamestown and adjacent area of the Virginia Colony beginning in 1607, spoke an Algonquian language.
turn.8: Each tribe of the Powhatan Confederacy was led by its own weroance.
